config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration _journalSizeThreshold is used in the journal() method to set the size threshold for the PersistentJournal. It is passed as a parameter when creating a new PersistentJournal instance.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration _journalSizeThreshold is triggered whenever the journal() method is called, which depends on the logic of the application. The frequency of triggering can vary based on how often the journal() method is invoked.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The _journalSizeThreshold configuration option impacts the size threshold for the PersistentJournal. Setting a higher threshold may allow for more data to be stored in the journal before it needs to be synced to disk, potentially impacting the system's performance and storage usage.
